mapper.select: select * from housedeal h left outer join houseinfo i on h.AptName=i.AptName where h.aptname like concat('%', #{aptName}, '%') limit 6

SELECT *, (6371*acos(cos(radians(lat))*cos(radians(#{lat}))*cos(radians(#{lng})-radians(lit))+sin(radians(lat))*sin(radians(#{lat})))) AS distance FROM parkinfo HAVING distance <= 1 ORDER BY distance;
SELECT *, (6371*acos(cos(radians(lat))*cos(radians(#{lat}))*cos(radians(#{lng})-radians(lit))+sin(radians(lat))*sin(radians(#{lat})))) AS distance FROM market HAVING distance <= 1 ORDER BY distance;
